author: IGN
description:
Get a behind the scenes look at how Epic games and Quentin Tarantino collaborated in Fortnite in order to make the lost chapter of Kill Bill, Yuki's Revenge.

#KillBill #Fortnite #IGN
title: The Making of Kill Bill Yuki's Revenge In Fortnite

author: IGN
description: In 1970s Korea, Kitae lives a double life as an agent for the Korea Central Intelligence Agency (KCIA) and an international drug dealer. The temptation of power pulling him further down a path of corruption and moral dilemma, he narrowly escapes the scrutiny of Gunyoung, a prosecutor relentless in his pursuit of justice. Directed by Woo Min-ho. Written by Park Eunkyo and Park Joonseok. Produced by Hive TMedia Group. Made in Korea will be released on Hulu and Disney+ on December 24, 2025 (available subbed and dubbed).
title: Made in Korea - Exclusive Trailer (2025) Hyun Bin, Jung Woo-sung

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
The latest leak for Ubisoft's still-unannounced Assassin's Creed Black Flag remake may have revealed the game's official title. Assassin's Creed Black Flag Resynced appeared on the PEGI ratings website, but has since been pulled, lending credence to the title's legitimacy. Ubisoft has yet to confirm its existence, but a previous financial results presentation teased an unannounced game for March 31, 2026. In other gaming leaks news, the PlayStation store may have revealed a major franchise character returning to Resident Evil. Art for Resident Evil Requiem features Leon S. Kennedy prominently along with new character Grace Ashcroft. Kennedy has not been featured in a mainline Resident Evil game since Resident Evil 6 back in 2012. Expect a proper reveal at The Game Awards later this week. And finally, take a peek into a four-park family vacation at Universal Orlando Resort.

Presented by Universal Orlando Resort.

#IGN #Gaming #AssassinsCreed
title: Assassin's Creed Black Flag Resynced Is the Remakes Official Title - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Factory 95 gets a new trailer and a demo announcement! Watch the latest Factory 95 trailer for this retro Windows-inspired automation game about making a slide show factory… in a slide show! Manage your space, make increasingly complex slides and worry about Y2K in this minimalistic factory builder. The new Factory 95 trailer gives us another look at gameplay. Factory 95 will be available on PC, and a demo is out now on Steam.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Factory 95 - Official Demo Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Death Howl will be available on PC (Steam, GOG, Windows PC, and PC Game Pass) on December 9, 2025. It will also be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, Nintendo Switch, and Xbox Game Pass on February 19, 2026. A demo is out now on Steam. Watch the Death Howl launch trailer for this soulslike deck builder. Craft cards and claim powerful totems to defeat the woeful spirits lurking in the mystical lands. Unravel the tale of a grieving mother in her desperate attempt to defy death and bring back her son.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Death Howl - Official Launch Trailer | 11 Bit Studios Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Take another look at Quarantine Zombies in this trailer for the upcoming first-person shooter meets quarantine inspection, set in post-apocalyptic Chicago. 

In Quarantine Zombies, you’ve got 30 days until the army arrives. Hold out, fix your car, and fight your way through Chicago to the main checkpoint to save your little brother. Quarantine Zombies will be available on PC.

#QuarantineZombies #FPS #Horror
title: Quarantine Zombies - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a fresh look at ShantyTown in this latest trailer for the upcoming relaxing, small-scale diorama-builder game about layering details until a world comes to life. ShantyTown is a calm, atmospheric builder where players create improvised neighbourhoods in unexpected spaces. Players stack shops, tuck rooftop gardens into corners, and build by instinct rather than rules. Four years in the making, the project has evolved from a modest experiment into a complete, thoughtfully crafted game that reflects the charm and honesty of imperfect design within dense cities. 

ShantyTown will be available on PC via Steam on April 16, 2025, and an updated demo is out now.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Shanty Town - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Rogue 'Temped to Touch' Character Reveal Trailer for Marvel Rivals, the hit team-based action shooter developed by NetEase Games. Players will gain access to Rogue as a Vanguard in the game, the iconic Mutant who wields the unique ability of absorbing the power of others by a single touch. Get a look at the gameplay style and tactics of Rogue in Marvel Rivals, launching with Season 5.5 on December 12 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).
title: Marvel Rivals - Official Rogue 'Temped to Touch' Character Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Our resident fighting game expert and EVO Competitor Mitchell Saltzman went hands-on with the new 2D fighting game, Avatar Legends, during the Closed Alpha Playtest. 

He breaks down the mechanics, the look, the uniqueness of the characters, and what he's especially excited about for the full release.

#IGN #AvatarLegends #FightingGames
title: Avatar Legends - Hands-On Impressions With the Closed Alpha Playtest

author: IGN
description:
The weapons are characters all on their own in High on Life 2, the upcoming first-person shooter comedy sequel from Squanch Games. Say hi to the latest one to be revealed: Travis, an SMG who is one half of a married dual-SMG couple whose relationship has gotten...a bit toxic.

High on Life 2 will be released on February 13, 2026 for PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S – including launching on day one into Xbox Game Pass.

#IGN #Gaming
title: High on Life 2 Weapon Reveal: Meet Travis, an SMG Voiced by Ken Marino – IGN First

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Announcement Trailer for Hell On Earth, a fast-paced action co-op roguelike developed by 2Frogs Software. Players will take on hordes of enemies across a suite of different levels to save the world from certain doom. Collect gold, earn custom heroes' skills, and more in Hell On Earth, coming soon to PC (Steam).

Wishlist the game on Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2781990/Hell_On_Earth/
title: Hell On Earth - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
How do you save Christmas? Watch The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim Anniversary Edition live-action trailer for this fantasy RPG to find out. The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim Anniversary Edition on Nintendo Switch 2 features enhanced resolution and faster load times. The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim Anniversary Edition on Nintendo Switch 2 includes the base game and three official expansions: Dawnguard, Dragonborn, and Hearthfire. It also features hundreds of unique Creations Club items and exclusive Nintendo content from The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, including the Master Sword, Hylian Shield, and Champion’s Tunic. 

Owners of the Anniversary Edition on Nintendo Switch can download the game for free on Nintendo Switch 2. Owners of the base edition on Nintendo Switch can purchase the Anniversary Upgrade, to then download the game on Nintendo Switch 2.

#IGN #Gaming #Skyrim
title: The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim Anniversary Edition - Official Nintendo Switch 2: Live-Action Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a look at the 'One Year of Adventure' Trailer for Indiana Jones and the Great Circle, the hit first-person action-adventure game developed by MachineGames. 

Players can access brand-new content free of charge to celebrate the game's one-year anniversary. Access the Pankot Palace outfit from Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom, alongside detailing some player accolades from their adventures as Indiana Jones. 

Indiana Jones and the Great Circle is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #IndianaJonesAndTheGreatCircle #ActionAdventure
title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle - Official 'One Year of Adventure' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the 'Project Messiah' Season 5 Gameplay Launch Trailer for The Outlast Trials, a co-op action horror game developed by Red Barrels. 

Players will be able to access an all-new Trial environment at the Resort to engage with the new Trial of "Despoil the Auction" and prepare to face the divine, or face their reckoning all the same. The new season is also packed with 2 new MK-Challenges, an update to the Invasion Experimental Therapy, and more. 'Project Messiah' Season 5 for The Outlast Trials is available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #TheOutlastTrials #Horror
title: The Outlast Trials - Official 'Project Messiah' Season 5 Gameplay Launch Trailer

description:
Get the rundown on the latest updates with the Season 5.5 Dev Vision Vol. 12 Video for Marvel Rivals, a free-to-play team-based action shooter developed by NetEase Games. 

Players will be introduced to the new update, which dives into fresh lore, upcoming tweaks, and more. With Season 5.5, players can access Rogue as a Vanguard who's able to charge into enemy lines and make use of powerful melee abilities. 

Season 5.5 kicks off on December 12 for Marvel Rivals on PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #MarvelRivals #Rogue
title: Marvel Rivals - Official Season 5.5 Dev Vision Vol. 12 Video

description:
Check out the Mounts of Mayhem Launch Trailer for Minecraft, the adventure creation game developed by Mojang. 

Players will take down undead foes with their trusty mount, a new tiered weapon with the spear, allowing for immense damage based on precision and speed, and more to take on enemy threats. Head into battle with the Mounts of Mayhem update for Minecraft, available now.

#IGN #Minecraft  #Creation
title: Minecraft - Official Mounts of Mayhem Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Get your last look at From the Ashes, the new expansion for the popular first-person action-adventure Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora, before it launches on December 19 (not coincidentally, the same day as the Avatar: Fire and Ash feature film hits theaters) for PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S.
title: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora – From the Ashes | Official Expansion Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Rhythm Doctor's 1.0 version reviewed by Will Borger on PC.

Rhythm Doctor is one of the hardest games I’ve played in a hot second, regardless of genre. But the music, the humor, the characters are all so strong that it compelled me to stick with it. Most of all, I loved the way Rhythm Doctor embraced being a game and using that to tell its story in a way no other medium could. These songs aren’t just something you play along with; you feel them. You experience them and the emotions they convey because of how they’re presented. It’s a remarkable achievement. And all it takes is one button.
title: Rhythm Doctor Review

author: IGN
description:
The Terminator is back in Terminator 2D NO FATE! Play as the T-800, Sarah Connor, and John Connor through exhilirating missions based on James Cameron's Terminator 2 Judgement Day. 

Battle across time to stop Skynet's plans before the human race is annihilated, as you experience the tense race against time in the present, and mankinds desperate struggle against the machines in the future. With multiple endings, and entirely new scenarios humanity's survival rests with you! 

Terminator 2D: NO FATE releases on PlayStation 4 (PS4, PS4 Pro), PlayStation 5 (PS5, PS5 Pro), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store) on December 12th, 2025!

#IGN #Terminator2DNoFate #Retro
title: Terminator 2D: No Fate – Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Winter Nexus ‘Hunters in the Storm’ Trailer for EVE Online, a free-to-play sci-fi RPG developed by CCP. Players can now access a full-scale seasonal event with the return of Winter Nexus, which sees dangerous ice storms ravage New Eden. 

Earn daily login rewards and a seasonal reward track featuring the new Perseverance ice mining destroyer ship reward, alongside more to enjoy. The Winter Nexus event for EVE Online runs from December 9 through January 12, 2026, for PC.

#IGN #EveOnline #SciFi
title: EVE Online - Official Winter Nexus ‘Hunters in the Storm’ Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Hone your skills as a Ninja and defend Ninjago Island from invading monsters! Watch the new LEGO Fortnite Odyssey trailer to see what's coming with the Ninjago: Rise of the Ninja update. 

On Ninjago Island, you can explore, master elemental abilities, and learn Spinjitzu as the story evolves. Additionally, purchasing the Ninjago LEGO pass auto-unlocks the Kai outfit. LEGO Fortnite Odyssey's Ninjago: Rise of the Ninja launches on December 11, 2025, and the story continues in a second Ninjago update coming in 2026.

#IGN #LegoFortniteOdyssey #Ninjago
title: LEGO Fortnite Odyssey - Official Ninjago Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Jurassic World Evolution 3's Wetlands pack is available now on PC, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X|S. Watch the Jurassic World Evolution 3: Wetlands launch trailer for the expansion of the management sim game, which brings hundreds of wetland & bayou-inspired scenery items and three new species. 

With the Wetlands pack for Jurassic World Evolution 3, mesmerize your guests with the fierce Irritator, prowling Austroraptor, and rapid Hypsilophodon, each with their own striking family unit. Build misty waterside enclosures with hundreds of scenery items and thirteen blueprints featuring a boathouse, rusty shacks, and wooden pontoons, all inspired by wetland and bayou locations.

#IGN #JurassicWorldEvolution3 #ParkSim
title: Jurassic World Evolution 3 - Official Wetlands Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim Anniversary Edition is available now on Nintendo Switch 2. Watch The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim Anniversary Edition trailer to see gameplay from this fantasy RPG, featuring enhanced resolution and faster load times. The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim Anniversary Edition includes the base game and three official expansions: Dawnguard, Dragonborn, and Hearthfire. It also features hundreds of unique Creations Club items and exclusive Nintendo content from The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, including the Master Sword, Hylian Shield, and Champion’s Tunic. 

Owners of the Anniversary Edition on Nintendo Switch can download the game for free on Nintendo Switch 2. Owners of the base edition on Nintendo Switch can purchase the Anniversary Upgrade, to then download the game on Nintendo Switch 2.

title: The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim Anniversary Edition - Official Nintendo Switch 2 Gameplay Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Official Trailer #2 for Mercy, a sci-fi crime thriller distributed by Amazon MGM Studios. Follow a man's journey to convince a super-intelligent AI judge of his innocence in the death of his wife in Mercy, in theaters on January 23, 2026.

In the near future, a detective (Chris Pratt) stands on trial accused of murdering his wife. He has 90 minutes to prove his innocence to the advanced A.I. Judge (Rebecca Ferguson) he once championed, before it determines his fate.

The sci-fi thriller is directed by Timur Bekmambetov (Wanted) and also stars Kali Reis, Annabelle Wallis, Chris Sullivan, and Kylie Rogers.

Amazon MGM Studios will release Mercy in theaters on January 23, 2026.

#IGN #Mercy #SciFi
title: Mercy - Official Trailer #2 (2026) Chris Pratt, Rebecca Ferguson, Kali Reis

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the Gate Guard Simulator announcement trailer for this upcoming medieval job-sim. The Gate Guard Simulator shows what you can expect from this game, and your job in stopping riff-raff from passing through the gates. Arrest criminals, inspect suspicious carts, turn away citizens for various reasons (including having diseases), and maybe even accept a bribe to let contraband rabbits through. Gate Guard Simulator will be available on PC via Steam. You can learn more about the game and wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/4111570/Gate_Guard_Simulator/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Gate Guard Simulator - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Mega Dimension DLC Launch Trailer for Pokemon Legends: Z-A, the latest addition to the creature-collecting action RPG developed by Game Freak. Players can access all-new story content that sees mysterious distortions pop up around town, kicking off a deep journey into Hyperspace Lumiose. Catch more Pokemon and continue the adventure with the Mega Dimension DLC for Pokemon Legends: Z-A, available now for Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2.

#PokemonLegendsZA #IGN #Gaming
title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A Has Just Released the New Mega Dimension DLC, Available Now!

author: IGN
description:
Join producer Danny Boyle, director Nia DaCosta, and star Ralph Fiennes (who plays Dr. Ian Kelson) for a behind-the-scenes look at the upcoming horror film, 28 Years Later: The Bone Temple, including a peek at the story and more. 28 Years Later: The Bone Temple also stars Jack O'Connell, Alfie Williams, Erin Kellyman, and Chi Lewis-Parry.

Expanding upon the world created by Danny Boyle and Alex Garland in 28 Years Later - but turning that world on its head - Nia DaCosta directs 28 Years Later: The Bone Temple. In a continuation of the epic story, Dr. Kelson (Ralph Fiennes) finds himself in a shocking new relationship - with consequences that could change the world as they know it - and Spike's (Alfie Williams) encounter with Jimmy Crystal (Jack O'Connell) becomes a nightmare he can't escape. In the world of The Bone Temple, the infected are no longer the greatest threat to survival - the inhumanity of the survivors can be stranger and more terrifying.

28 Years Later: The Bone Temple
title: 28 Years Later: The Bone Temple - Official 'Confrontation' Behind-The-Scenes Video

author: IGN
description:
The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles are finally getting a first-person video game, and it's a VR game. Both novel approaches to the Heroes in a Half-Shell seem to work quite well for TMNT: Empire City, though, based on our initial first impressions. Previewed by Travis Northup

#IGN #Gaming #TMNT
title: TMNT: Empire City Shows How Perfect the Ninja Turtles Might Be for VR

author: IGN
description:
Skate Story reviewed by Luke Reilly on PC. Also available on PlayStation 5 and Switch 2. 

"Learning to skate can be hell, and Skate Story proves this by taking us to what’s probably the weirdest vision of the underworld you’ll see without a belly full of Guatemalan Insanity Peppers. Fusing a solid foundation of satisfyingly grounded skate tricks with a bizarre, abstract world bathed in neon and starlight, Skate Story is a wild trip. I question its replayability and the limited nature of some of its objectives (and I did lose focus occasionally while tapping through its regular text-based conversations) but there’s no doubt it’s one of the most distinctive skateboarding games of the decade."
title: Skate Story Review

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Reveal Trailer for The Boys: Trigger Warning, a VR action-adventure game based on the hit comic and Amazon Prime Video series developed by Avore Immersive Games. Players will fight alongside Butcher, M.M., and Kimiko in virtual reality on a brand-new story as an original character who accidentally uncovers a grotesque Vought secret that turns a family outing into carnage. Engage in deep stealth and combat mechanics as the war against Supes hits a boiling point. The Boys: Trigger Warning is launching in 2026 for Meta Quest and PlayStation VR2 (PS VR2).
title: The Boys: Trigger Warning - Official Reveal Trailer
